alert.note: Alert for Clearfield; Northern Centre; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 8:45PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN CLINTON... NORTHERN CENTRE...CLEARFIELD...AND SOUTHERN CENTRE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 845 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was over Bellefonte moving east at 55 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... State College, Lock Haven, DuBois, Clearfield, Bellefonte, Sandy, Park Forest Village, Carroll, Woodward, Boalsburg, Pleasant Gap, Philipsburg, Woodland, Curwensville, Lamar, Stormstown, Lemont, Zion, Houserville and Mill Hall. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Dubois and Mile Run exits, specifically from mile markers 97 to 194. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 56 to 85. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Clearfield; Northern Centre; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton
